name: Ultimate Notion Book tracker (with AI)
description: If you're a bookworm and Notion user, this template is for you! It enables you to:Easily add books to your reading listOrganize books into shelves: reading, want-to-read, and readTrack progress and estimated time to finish based on your reading speedTake notes and assign them to specific booksGet AI book recommendations based on books in your databaseGet AI generated synopsis and list of interesting chapters and quotes for each book!It's simple to set up and use, so get it now! features: Easily add books to your reading list; Organize books into shelves: reading, want-to-read, and read; Track progress and estimated time to finish based on your reading speed; Take notes and assign them to specific books; Get AI book recommendations based on books in your database; Get AI generated synopsis and list of interesting chapters and quotes for each book!
